job_title: WIC Breastfeeding Peer Counselor in Milwaukee, WI
pros: Flexible Schedule, Self-managed, great work/life balance, great work environment
cons: WIC isn't given the best resources/funding

job_title: Customer Service Representative (CSR) in Milwaukee, WI

pros: Good colleagues to work with in a fast paced environment. There is a lot of room for growth for the company that has endured much change and financial struggles for the past 2 years.
cons: There is a lot of change over happening with difficulty in provider retention and there could be more effective communication among management employees. Base salary with not only potential bonuses but subtraction on base salary if minimum is not met in productivity. Due to lack of policy and transient patient population high no-show rate makes it very difficult to meet productivity requirements.

review_title: I Enjoyed Patients and the fact they appreciate the organization

cons:
overworked
long hours
low pay
micromanagement
lack of recognition
